titleStmt.title: A Trve narrative concerning the armies preservation of the Kings Majesties person by which it doth appeare that the army doth intend the good, life, property, and liberty of all the Commons of England, and not the destruction of them.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Benson and are to be sold in his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: "Printed by order from the army for the taking off those aspersions which hath been cast upon them for that action."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
